document.discussion_title: Take Time to Smell the Flowers - Sometimes Cats Herd You
document.topic_text: August 12, 2016 by feline Leave a Comment Newton: Flowers? For me? You shouldn’t have! Newton: * SNIFF * How lovely! Pierre: Oh, hey, Newt, what do you have there? Newt: What does it look like? Pierre: It looks like flowers. Who sent you flowers? Newton: Probably a secret admirer. There’s no card. Pierre: No card? Then how do you know the flowers are for you? Maybe they’re for me. Newton: Because I found them first. My secret admirer is shy. Pierre: Fine, you can have them. They don’t smell like they will taste good, anyhow. Newton: Ha, they’re all mine now! Newton: I really wish I knew who sent you, little flowers. Too bad you can’t talk. If you could you would…. OOPS! Newton: My poor flowers! This is sad. But no one saw this happen, so we can blame it on Pierre. The important part is that I get to keep the secret admirer. Save Filed Under: Cats Tagged With: Newton Leave a Comment
